documents_reviewed.title: Bar Application – Character and Fitness Disclosure
documents_reviewed.summary: Applicant voluntarily disclosed a 2020 DUI conviction (probation completed 2021) and a resolved academic probation matter, with no subsequent incidents and demonstrated rehabilitation.

documents_reviewed.title: Mental Health Treatment Records – Anxiety Disorder
documents_reviewed.summary: 42 sessions of CBT/ACT over nearly three years achieved clinical resolution of anxiety disorder; treating clinician opined the applicant demonstrated genuine rehabilitation and is fit for professional roles requiring sound judgment.

documents_reviewed.title: Personal Statement – Jordan Taylor
documents_reviewed.summary: Applicant contextualized the 2020 DUI within acute personal crises, documented proactive disclosure of all conduct issues, sustained sobriety since November 2020, and articulated demonstrated insight and commitment to ethical practice.

documents_reviewed.title: Paralegal Internship Verification – Hernandez & Associates
documents_reviewed.summary: 12-week internship completed with outstanding ratings across all competencies; no conduct or disciplinary issues; managing partner confirmed impeccable adherence to firm policies and exceptional ethical judgment.

overall_summary: Applicant discloses a 2020 DUI and resolved academic probation; mitigating factors include acute personal crises, proactive disclosure, completed probation, sustained sobriety, clinical treatment, and outstanding professional conduct during internship.
missing_evidence: Court or criminal records confirming DUI disposition and probation completion
Character reference letters (managing partner indicated intent to submit one but none present in file)
Academic disciplinary records documenting resolution of the plagiarism matter
